title: Looking to buy t206 American Beauty & EPDG backs

posts.post_title: Looking to buy t206 American Beauty & EPDG backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Martin
I'm looking to add an American Beauty (one from any of the three types) and an El Principe De Gales backed t206 common to my collection. I would prefer PSA graded examples in either a 3 or a 4 but would also consider a SGC 40 or 50.

By the way - I live in England so you must be willing to ship internationally.

Many thanks

Martin 
marpar73@hotmail.com
